scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf ./dist && rimraf ./aot && find ./src -name '*.js' -type f -delete && find ./src -name '*.map' -type f -delete
scripts.buildStyles: npm run postcss && npm run processStyles
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run buildStyles && gulp tsc
scripts.build:aot: npm run buildStyles && npm run processStyles && ngc -p tsconfig-aot.json && rollup -c rollup-config.js
scripts.processStyles: sed -i '1s/^/export const styles = ` /' src/select/select.component.css.ts && echo \`\; >> src/select/select.component.css.ts
